title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 202.20 - Interrogatories
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 202.20 - Interrogatories

State Regulations

Interrogatories are limited to 25 in number, including
subparts, unless the parties agree or the court orders otherwise. This limit
applies to consolidated actions as well. Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
